com.nokia.midp.examples.fileconnection
Class FileSelector

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Screen
          javax.microedition.lcdui.List
              com.nokia.midp.examples.fileconnection.FileSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.Choice, javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, javax.microedition.io.file.FileSystemListener, javax.microedition.media.PlayerListener
class FileSelector
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.List
implements javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, javax.microedition.io.file.FileSystemListener, javax.microedition.media.PlayerListener

A class used to access the file system, show currently available mid files and play them.
